channel.title: Susie is shocked
channel.description:
...As Daviddude36 becomes the Games section moderator! (And receives the sexy Persian Pokemon award!)
Congratulations David and welcome to the moderation team!

item.title: Susie is shocked
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:41, topic:204703”][quote author=jme link=topic=270234.msg2223337#msg2223337 date=1210669048]

One minute people are saying there are not enough mods, then when more mods are made people start complaining…

Start banning every person who makes a dumb thread on moparscape (all of them) and we’ll be happy.

I already attempted to ban every idiot I could find… Didn’t work so well. After about the 100th ban, I just couldn’t take the forum crashes anymore and gave up. I gave them all the message “You’re a turd” or something like that. Good times but the bans were removed.
[/quote]

Is that why you were demoted?[/quote]

He didn’t want to be a mod anymore. Now, let’s stay on topic.

Read full topic
